docs.snippet: The delegates to the Chaco peace conference worked feverishly yesterday and today trying to arrange a formula that would prove acceptable to Bolivia and Paraguay at tomorrow's session. It was said in well-informed circles today that this formula...
docs.lead_paragraph: The delegates to the Chaco peace conference worked feverishly yesterday and today trying to arrange a formula that would prove acceptable to Bolivia and Paraguay at tomorrow's session. It was said in well-informed circles today that this formula would be the neutrals' last attempt to settle the dispute.
